edu.uga.cs.recdawgs.entity

Interface Team

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable

    public interface Team
extends Persistable
    This class represents a recreational sports team, participating in one of the sports leagues. A team must have a name (which must be unique across all teams) and one student acting as the team captain. A team must have a league in which it participates and may become the league winner.
